page.title: 02EDMONTON GREEN
page.content: The focal point of our area is Edmonton Green,an enclosed square where greengrocers have their stalls. As you walk round you can hear the stallholders shouting to advertise their wares.Around the square are supermarkets and smaller shops. On Friday evenings my Dad buys fruit and vegetables at the stalls and on Thursday evening my parents get the week's food supply in Sainsburys. There is a joke shop which sells masks,wigs, sneezing powder and things to make people laugh. There is also an amusement arcade where young people put money in a slot machine to get a picture on the screen to start playing the game. It is very good fun but a waste of money.
